title: Stadium construction/renovation costs UEFA EURO 2016
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Stadiums, and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in each Stadiums on the y axis.

The Construction/renovation costs in million euros is appeared to be the highest at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) and lowest at Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).
The highest Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has 321.0 more Construction/renovation costs in million euros than the lowest Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).

mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Stadiums, and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in each Stadiums on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Stadiums in the x axis and Construction/renovation costs in million euros in the y axis.

Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has the highest Construction/renovation costs in million euros and Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation) has the lowest Construction/renovation costs in million euros.
The highest Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) has 321.0 more Construction/renovation costs in million euros than the lowest Stadiums Stadium Municipal Toulouse (major renovation).

Construction/renovation costs in million euros at Stadiums Stade des Lumières Lyon (new stadium) is 381.0 , second place is Grand Stade LMCU Lille (new stadium) at 324.0, and thirdly is Stade Vélodrome Marseille (major renovation) at 267.0.
Stadiums Stade Bollaert Lens (major renovation), and Stade Geoffroy Guichard Saint-Etienne (major renovation) share the same value 75.0.
The average Construction/renovation costs in million euros in all 9 Stadiumss is 185.56.
